question: How would you say "I am living in..."?
options: Tá mé i mo cóaní i...

question: How would you say "You are in Dublin"?
options: Tá tú i mBaile Átha Cliath.
Tá tú i Baile Átha Cliath.
Tá muid i mBaile Átha Cliath.
Tá muid i Baile Átha Cliath.
answer: Tá tú i mBaile Átha Cliath.
reason: Some prepositions (such as "i" meaing "in") are followed by the úrú. The city of Dublin does not have an article "an" meaing "the".
